Articles.Content: I mixed it with the thing my ships are made of: An Iron-Titanium alloy. This makes it very nearly ivinvible, along with my signature particle shield.
Primary phasers armed, 26 targets aquired
All of my available BOT forces go after the boarding party. Meanwhile, Xannari is unaccounted for.
Actually, we activated our stealth systems, it retains heat in specific sinks to be dissipated later from the weapons. this includes human body heat
When suddenly, I take a shot to the back (I've been hurt alot lately. First the ambush. Then the reality shift.)
Leaving relay in 3...2...1...! Weapons online!

> 
> I mixed it with the thing my ships are made of: An Iron-Titanium alloy. This makes it very nearly ivinvible, along with my signature particle shield.

But the iron can conduct electricity, so the dampening effects on Kinemet are nullified! You can fix this by retrofitting the shield generator to conduct a positive flow current through the hull.
(Junior, are you on my ship or Laythe's at this point)
Sorry. You do it. I'm too busy not dying.
Send engineers to the Citadel's shield room!

I'm on the citadel. The attackers are boarding.

- - - Updated - - -

Also, my back hurts from lasers,

(Sensing reality) 

Sampa, Dark's hurt!

I'm beaming aboard the Citadel.
engaging nearest ship, firing phase cannons...point blank... shatters shields and knocks weapons offline in first pass.

[beams aboard]

- - - Updated - - -

Sampa, can you remotely control the Discovery?
\*grunts\* hang on!
I lost too much blood. I pass out.

<runs to="" dark=""></runs>

Dark! You okay?

- - - Updated - - -

Sampa, beam us to the med bay in the Discovery!

> 
> [beams aboard]
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Sampa, can you remotely control the Discovery?

Getting a lock...Yes! EDI (ship's shackled ai) take control of main ship, helmsmen, take remote control of the discovery

- - - Updated - - -

Can't get a lock, see if you can't enhance your signal...the council chamber, can you get there? there was a signal enhancer there for emergency beam out procedures...

Takes Dark to med bay

- - - Updated - - -

MedBots, you take care of him!

[Error, Unrecognized Action]

[Terminate]

Uh Oh
second, third and fourth passes finally manage to destroy the enemy fleet...

Those ships must be AI controlled! They've taken over the MedBots!

- - - Updated - - -

Sampa, beam us up!

EDI, can you get control of the med bots?

EDI: yes

Shut them down, now! (this is why I always preferred live surgeons) Laythe, get Junior to a stasis pod, we have live surgeons on the Citadel, once we clear it. the Stasis pod should keep him alive

WARNING: PROXIMITY ALERT

We've got more coming. Arm all weapons!

- - - Updated - - -

Stay with me, Dark.

(places in Stasis pod)
[Holy CRAP. I went away for 13 minutes, and now this nonsese. Where am I at this point?]
Laythe, get back on your ship, I'm going down there, I NEED to activate the stations weapon systems.
